text: Viana do Castelo is a city and municipality in Portugal. It is the capital of the Viana do Castelo District. In 2011, 88,725 people lived there,Instituto Nacional de Estatística and its area is 319.02 km². It is on the Atlantic Ocean at the mouth of the Lima River. == References == Category:Municipalities of Portugal Category:Cities in Portugal
title: Viana do Castelo
